#summary Retrieve the root inventory folder UUID for the specified user.
#labels Protocol-Inventory

= Request Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* || *Required* ||
||`RequestMethod`||GetInventory||String||Yes||
||`OwnerID`||UUID of the inventory owner||UUID||Yes||

{{{
RequestMethod=GetRootFolder
&OwnerID=2960f0cd-2bd3-4559-89ea-d86cc3696c7a
}}}

= Response Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||`Success`||True if a FolderID was returned, False if a Message was returned||Boolean||
||`FolderID`||UUID of the root folder||UUID||
||`Message`||Error message||String||

Success:

{{{
{
    "Success":"true",
    "FolderID":"3dc86b9d-da9d-4f7e-8ddb-5d5b06279b2e"
}
}}}

Failure:

{{{
{
    "Success":"false",
    "Message":"Inventory not found"
}
}}}
